author: Annette Aurelio

review: I have been streaming movies for years. i started on x-box, then roku 1, roku 2 , roku 3. I am a huge purchaser of movies on amazon instant. I use this more than any other feature. because of that fact, the fire tv is the best option. the default application you are in when the device boots is amazon instant. The "learning feature" of the box is great especially with seasons of shows you are watching. It will instantly start a video and there is little to no "low quality" time while the show buffers. I also think that the black level artifacting is less with this device than the roku 3. as for the "prime" movies not being easily found like they are on the roku, i personally like the fact that i can easily find my purchased content faster on this box. you can see easily without clicking on a icon that there is a prime sticker on the top left that will tell you that it is free for viewing.Voice features work great too. easy to search amazon instant for a movie.If you were going to use this box for netflix only, you surely could, but i think that the roku may be an easier box for just that.Bottom line, if you use amazon instant alot on the roku, this is the next box you want to buy.
